sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYNALŒPHA, in grammar, a contraction of ſyllables, performed principally, by ſuppreſſing ſome vowel or diphthong at the end of a word, on account of another vowel or diphthong at the beginning of the next. As, ill ego, for ille ego, &c.
Conticuer' omnes intentiqu' ora tenebant. Virg.
It is called by the Latins collisio.
